column5: 2 recent pics from the Fishn Niagara facebook page , Denis is a diehard on the Upper Niagara  The laker is a slob
Yeah, Denis is a madman on the upper.
Wow. Didn’t know there were lakers on the Upper Niagara. Nice!
Somebody needs to get that guy some gloves! Some nice fish!
Most would guess the New York record laker would be an Lake  Ontario fish, nope, an almost 40 from Erie has that honour.  correction : 41 1/2 pounds
Awesome!   Wicked fishery from top to bottom.
Fantastic, I've heard of Denis, he's the Man on the Niagara. Thanks for the pics Dave, when I think it's too hot and humid down here I will open this page.
